content: row 1 and 4 for twist whilst decreasing 2 stitches every other row 8 times 72 stitches in total at the start of needle 3 and at the end of needle 4 ending in a round 4 you will need to adjust the actual stitches being decreased to maintain the appearance of the pattern there will now be a slightly uneven stitch count for each colour 19 stitches for two of the colours and 17 for the other two on the next round 1 included in the repeat count below decrease 1 stitch at the start of each colour that has a count of 19 and increase 1 stitch at the end of each colour that has a count of 17 so that all blocks of colour now have 18 stitches repeat rounds 1-4 of the pattern 15 times or row 1 and 4 of the pattern 30 times for twist on the 12th and 15th repeats or 24th and 30th repeats for twist increase 1 stitch at the start of each color for a total of 80 stitches cut all four strands of yarn leaving tails for weaving in cuff change to colour a and knit 1 round of stocking stitch then 15 rounds of k2 p2 rib cast off using jeny s suprisingly stretchy bind-off http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php or your chosen cast-off method weave in ends block if desired for the second sock you may wish to change the colours around for example swap colours b with d and c with e tilt & twist v4 by jennifer pattison page 3 of 3
